summary: This is a memorandum from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General documenting a voluntary interview conducted on July 15, 2021, with a BOP Electronics Technician regarding the investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document references an attached transcript of the interview.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation into his death while housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Electronics Technician
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary interview of a BOP Electronics Technician regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General was investigating the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
An interview was conducted on July 15, 2021, with a BOP Electronics Technician who was at the MCC New York when Epstein was housed there.
The interview was recorded and transcribed, with the transcript attached to this memorandum.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum and contains neither recommendations nor conclusions of the investigation.
The document is marked as not to be distributed outside the receiving agency.
